posts.Title: LyricsToCloud
posts.Description: LyricsToCloud : A python script to generate word clouds from Top 100 End of the Year Billboard song lyrics

posts.Title: BIP xTech Sales Forecast
posts.Description: Advadanced prediction techniques used to forecast the sales of 749 shops. The project is a team effort for the course Data and Text Mining at Politecnico di Milano, A.Y. 2017/2018

posts.Title: House price prediction
posts.Description: This competition challenges you to predict the final price of each home with 79 explanatory variables describing (almost) every aspect of residential homes in Ames, Iowa. Done in Python and Jupyter
